column4: I don't know where else to say it, but I'm awfully impressed with ubuntu 6.06 - it's the first linux install I've tried that detects and uses correctly all the hardware I use on my iMac first go without a bucketload of screwing around. 3 cheers for that :D.
- I'm impressed with the same thing for my Breezy install :P
Breezy was quite close for me, but not all there - it was enough for me to give dapper a go though.
- I'm passing on Dapper until it's stable for my laptop :P
